title: Businesses Buzz With Anticipation In Wake Of U.S.-Cuba Thaw
teaser: The U.S. economic embargo on Cuba is still solidly in place. But the president's executive action opening relations with the island has set off a frenzy of speculation about a new era of U.S.-Cuba commerce.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
